items.sentence: When cleaning the classroom, a few students carry the podium.
I want to get that classic car no matter how expensive it is.
Tom still hopes you can take care of his dog while he's away.
Tom can play the saxophone. Mary can play the saxophone, too.
Tom didn't like the house that he'd inherited, so he sold it.
Tom likes Boston better than any other place he's ever lived.
I wonder how many people Tom is expecting to be at his party.
We have weapons. We just hope that we don't need to use them.
We hope that we get enough donations to build a library here.
When you enter a tunnel, you need to turn on your headlights.
